display_long_description:
Welcome to Ape Tagger, a heart-pounding VR horror experience where your speed, agility, and instincts are your only means of survival. Using the fast and fluid gorilla tag locomotion, you must run, climb, and vault your way through dark, abandoned landscapes—because something is hunting you, and it never tires.

Trapped in an eerie, decaying facility deep in the jungle, you awaken with no memory of how you got there. The walls whisper with unseen horrors, and the only way out is forward. But you’re not alone. Shadows move in unnatural ways, grotesque creatures lurk just out of sight, and every sound you make could be your last. Your only chance of survival is to stay ahead—keep moving, keep climbing, and never let them catch you.

The creatures hunting you are intelligent, adapting to your movements and learning your escape patterns. Hide too often, and they will find new ways to corner you. Move too loudly, and they will close in faster than you can react. As you progress, new horrors emerge, each more relentless than the last. Will you outmaneuver them and uncover the truth behind Ape Tagger, or will you become another lost soul in the darkness?

Key Features:
🦍 Gorilla Tag Locomotion: Run, jump, climb, and swing using only your hands in a highly immersive movement system.
👁 Adaptive AI: Enemies learn from your playstyle, making each encounter more terrifying than the last.

Run fast. Hide smart. Survive the hunt. Ape Tagger is waiting.
